entities.name: the boy
entities.description: The main character of the story who is able to recognize Professor McGonagall in disguise as a cat. He is described as sitting on a brick wall and wearing a cloak.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A rather severe-looking woman who is wearing square glasses and an emerald cloak. She is able to transform into a cat and is recognized by the boy.

relationships.description: The boy recognizes Professor McGonagall in disguise as a cat. This is evident from the conversation between them, where the boy addresses her as 'Professor McGonagall'.
